urls.title: FELLOWSHIP | Africa Bitcoin Conference
urls.description: Over the past few years, there has been a massive surge in the adoption and use of bitcoin across the world. In Africa, even though internet penetration is low, the growth has been phenomenal with a 1200 per cent increase in crypto adoption between June 2020 and July 2021. In Africa, Nigeria is ranked first in the 2021 Global Crypto Adoption Index. The AfroBitcoin Fellowship is an initiative of the Ega Yeye Academy and the Africa Bitcoin Conference to identify and support African developer talents

urls.title: Boozman, Stabenow, Booker and Thune Introduce Legislation to Regulate Digital Commodities
urls.description: U.S. Senators Debbie Stabenow (D-MI), Chairwoman of the Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry, and John Boozman (R-AR), Ranking Member, along with Senators Cory Booker (D-NJ) and John Thune (R-SD) today introduced the Digital Commodities Consumer Protection Act of 2022 to give the Commodity Futures Trading Commission new tools and authorities to regulate digital commodities.
